TopicTitle: Pausing during "warp to maneuver" and resuming makes the warp forget to stop at the maneuver.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: i7-10870H | GPU: RTX 3070 | RAM: 16GB

 

When warping to a maneuver, pausing the game and then resuming causes the game to forget that it's warping to a maneuver and zoom past it.

Edited December 5, 2023 by The Space Peacock
